entry.title: New release for Grimoire Companion: v0.1.0
New release for Grimoire Companion: v0.1.1
entry.content:
Full Changelog: https://github.com/goniszewski/grimoire-web-extension/compare/v0.1.0...v0.1.1

  • fix: properly handle page icon parsed from browser API (Firefox)
  • resolve errors related to properties of undefined (Firefox)

entry.title: New release for Grimoire Companion: v0.1.2
entry.content:
• fix: ask for the necessary promises beforehand; fix creating page screenshot; add more logs by @goniszewski in https://github.com/goniszewski/grimoire-web-extension/commit/24309dfa6ba18cdb48f8fbfff61fd34ec351371a
  • chore: add screenshot by @goniszewski in 5629371
  • chore: add link to Chrome Web Store by @goniszewski in 44c1325

entry.title: New release for Grimoire Companion: v0.1.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: resolve issue with Grimoire API not reachable on Firefox by @goniszewski in https://github.com/goniszewski/grimoire-web-extension/pull/10

New Contributors

  • @goniszewski made their first contribution in https://github.com/goniszewski/grimoire-web-extension/pull/10

Full Changelog: https://github.com/goniszewski/grimoire-web-extension/compare/v0.1.2...v0.1.3
